name: Phase Pulse Cannon
customPrimary: DPS Improves dramatically with `Phase Level`, charged by being in phase space and expended when firing.
customAncillary:
Phase Level Modifiers:
Above 1% - 35 damage per shot / 200 DPS
Above 25% - 52.5 damage per shot / 300 DPS
Above 50% - 78.75 damage per shot / 450 DPS
Above 75% - 118.125 damage per shot / 675 DPS
